name: Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D Free
description:
Explore jurassic jungles being a Tyrannosaurus (T-Rex) one of the biggest dinos! Try new Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D game! Walk in the jungles, hunt for dinos and enjoy being a dinosaur! Amazing dino simulator for all ages! Be a dinosaur, hunt other dinos and have fun with Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D!

Go back to Jurassic age with this simulator! Hunt out each smaller dinosaur and feel the power of Tyrannosaurus. T-Rex is one of the most frightening dinos of the Jurassic era!

Rule realistic dinosaur by playing Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D! Survive in jurassic jungles inhabited by dinos! Explore the world, hunt to feed your T-Rex, but beware of bigger dinos! Each Tyrannosaurus in jungles may attack you. Hunt or be hunted! Upgrade your T-Rex with each hunt and enjoy our Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D!

Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D features:

Realistic jurassic jungles
Powerful 3D Tyrannosaurus
Small dinos to hunt and bigger to fight against
Complicated missions
Bonuses for your dinosaur for each hunt!

Explore amazing jurassic jungles being a dinosaur with this simulator! Feel like a huge powerful Tyrannosaurus. Try our new Dinosaur: T-Rex Simulator 3D and enjoy dinos life!
